law.catch_line: Assessments On Metropolitan Districts For Bonds
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 112. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] On all bonds issued for the benefit of any of the metropolitan districts, so called, the state treasurer shall assess upon the said metropolitan districts annually amounts necessary to provide for the serial and sinking fund payments falling due with respect to such bonds.
